content.question: Squatter settlements exist in cities of less-developed countries because

choices.label: city governments set aside vacant areas for new migrants
people want to live near the center of the city, where jobs are located
affordable housing is not available elsewhere for new migrants to the city
new migrants prefer to live in squatter settlements with other recent migrants
new migrants need to be isolated from other city residents until they adjust Â to urban life

content.answer: affordable housing is not available elsewhere for new migrants to the city

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
